title: Try to unify @Value and @ConfigurationProperties
body: It would be nice if relaxed binding could be used with `@Value` injection.

title: provide documentation for spring-boot-actuator-docs
body:
What is the project used for?
What features does it provide additionally to spring-boot-actuator?

title: The environment post processor that handles application.properties is always added to the end of the list
Inconsistent thread synchronization in EmbeddedWebApplicationContext.java
body: FindBugs identified an inconsistent thread synchronization issue for spring-boot in the EmbeddedWebApplicationContext class. When finishRefresh() is unsynchronized, it is possible for embeddedServletContainer to be set to null before publishEvent() was called. Synchronizing the method makes all accesses of this field consistent.

title: Document support for colour coding log output
body: As far as I can see neither `%clr` nor any of the specific colors such as `{magenta}` and `{yellow}` are documented.

title: Add a section in the documentation related to Jersey/Actuator
body: This add more information for people interested in using Jersey/Actuator in the same project.

title: Register Thymeleaf's Java8TimeDialect by default if on the classpath
body:
Thymeleaf has a special dialect to format Java 8 date/time types just as it supports legacy `Date` instances out of the box.

Currently `thymeleaf-extras-java8time` has to be included manually (Boot doesn't have a managed version for that) and a Spring bean of type `Java8TimeDialect` has to be registered explicitly. Would be cool if that was registered out of the box.

title: Add option to initialise SendGrid from ApiKey
body: Add option to initialise SendGrid from ApiKey rather then user credentials

title: Add MessagePack support
body:
Added AutoConfigure for [MessagePack](https://github.com/msgpack/msgpack-java).
MessagePack is an efficient binary serialization format. It's like JSON but fast and small.

This PR supports MessagePack by adding `HttpMessageConverter` for MessagePack to Spring MVC and `RestTemplate`.

Only HTTP clients have to do is specifying `Accept` header with `application/x-msgpack`  to access the MessagePack format.

This format would be helpful for the communication between services.

title: ClassNotFoundException - ChannelSecurityInterceptor
body:
Trying to use web sockets and spring security in boot 1.3.0 leads to the following ClassNotFoundException.

Sample project showing the issue is available at: https://github.com/krm1312/springwssecurity

```
mvn clean package
```
or try to start it.  Java 1.8.0_65 on OS X.

title: Make chkconfig variable
body:
we want to use [chkconfig:         2345 80 20]
but currently chkconfig is  fixed to [chkconfig:         2345 99 01]
so i make chkconfig variable.

title: remove unused test.css
body: The test.css file doesn't have any effect at this sample.

title: Add application.title banner variable
body:
Analogous to the ```${application.version}``` ```banner.txt``` variable that reads ```Implementation-Version``` from ```MANIFEST.MF```, it would be nice to also have ```Implementation-Title``` value available as variable for banner customization.

This PR adds the ```${application.title}``` variable.

Motivation: Our current project consists of multiple Spring Boot based microservices, each having its custom banner. However, banners are the same with the exception of a string describing module name. With this change the same ```banner.txt``` could be reused across all the modules.

I've signed the CLA.
